title: wine_Quinta_de_la_Rosa_2014_Reserva_Branco_White_(Douro)
text:
Unnamed: 0: 92110.
country: Portugal.
description: This is a ripe, wood aged wine that has great structure as well as ample fruit flavor. It has a touch of toastiness—50% is aged in oak—although it is sophisticated and subtle. Apple, fresh apricot and green plum flavors show through the still young texture. All native grapes—35% Viosinho, 35% Rabigato and other locals from the estate—are the same used for Port blends. To bring out the richer, more rounded side of this wine, wait until 2017 to enjoy..
designation: Reserva Branco.
points: 91.
price: 26.0.
province: Douro.
region_1: .
region_2: .
taster_name: Roger Voss.
taster_twitter_handle: @vossroger.
